title: Thiendavis – For The Perfect Salvation - Novel Updates
author: 김영지
description:
“You’re as rude as you look!”

One day, a curse befell Evie Ariathe, the lovely saint candidate.

It’s a curse that answers the truth to every question, in a nutshell.

With the curse starting suddenly, dark clouds hang over her promising future, and the position of a saint which she was so close to getting, becomes infinitely distant.

Nevertheless, the beautiful saint candidate, Evie Ariathe, must become a saint. For the perfect salvation of Thiendavis, a world full of secrets.>
